description: Creates one or more Amazon Lightsail instances. The create instances operation supports tag-based access control via request tags. For more information, see the Lightsail Developer Guide.

parameters.name: instanceNames
parameters.description: The names to use for your new Lightsail instances. Separate multiple values using quotation marks and commas, for example: ["MyFirstInstance","MySecondInstance"] (string) ---

parameters.name: availabilityZone
parameters.description: The Availability Zone in which to create your instance. Use the following format: us-east-2a (case sensitive). You can get a list of Availability Zones by using the get regions operation. Be sure to add the include Availability Zones parameter to your request.

parameters.name: customImageName
parameters.description: (Discontinued) The name for your custom image.

parameters.name: blueprintId
parameters.description: The ID for a virtual private server image ( app_wordpress_x_x or app_lamp_x_x). Use the get blueprints operation to return a list of available images (or blueprints).

parameters.name: bundleId
parameters.description: The bundle of specification information for your virtual private server (or instance), including the pricing plan ( medium_x_x).

parameters.name: userData
parameters.description: A launch script you can create that configures a server with additional user data. For example, you might want to run apt-get -y update.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tag keys and optional values to add to the resource during create. Use the TagResource action to tag a resource after it's created. (dict) --- Describes a tag key and optional value assigned to an Amazon Lightsail resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide. key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys accept a maximum of 128 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @ value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values accept a maximum of 256 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys accept a maximum of 128 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values accept a maximum of 256 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @

parameters.name: addOns
parameters.description: An array of objects representing the add-ons to enable for the new instance. (dict) --- Describes a request to enable, modify, or disable an add-on for an Amazon Lightsail resource. The add-on type. autoSnapshotAddOnRequest (dict) --- An object that represents additional parameters when enabling or modifying the automatic snapshot add-on. snapshotTimeOfDay (string) --- The daily time when an automatic snapshot will be created. Constraints: Must be in HH:00 format, and in an hourly increment. Specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The snapshot will be automatically created between the time specified and up to 45 minutes after. stopInstanceOnIdleRequest (dict) --- An object that represents additional parameters when enabling or modifying the StopInstanceOnIdle add-on. threshold (string) --- The value to compare with the duration. duration (string) --- The amount of idle time in minutes after which your virtual computer will automatically stop.

nested_params.name: autoSnapshotAddOnRequest
nested_params.description: An object that represents additional parameters when enabling or modifying the automatic snapshot add-on.

nested_params.name: snapshotTimeOfDay
nested_params.description: The daily time when an automatic snapshot will be created. Constraints:

nested_params.name: stopInstanceOnIdleRequest
nested_params.description: An object that represents additional parameters when enabling or modifying the StopInstanceOnIdle add-on.

nested_params.name: threshold
nested_params.description: The value to compare with the duration.

nested_params.name: duration
nested_params.description: The amount of idle time in minutes after which your virtual computer will automatically stop.

parameters.name: ipAddressType
parameters.description: The IP address type for the instance. The possible values are ipv4 for IPv4 only, ipv6 for IPv6 only, and dualstack for IPv4 and IPv6. The default value is dualstack.

nested_items.name: operations
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the result of the action, such as the status of the request, the timestamp of the request, and the resources affected by the request.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the operation was initialized ( 1479816991.349).

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: isTerminal
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the operation is terminal.

nested_items.name: statusChangedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the status was changed ( 1479816991.349).
